channel.title: Run.bat 667-718 error help need FIXED SOLUTION
channel.description:
starting... "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" is not recognized as an inter- ne or external command, operable program or batch file. press a key to continue
run.bat error script run.bat [code] @echo off title Project-PVP echo starting... "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause [/code] so i upgraded jre to jre7 then replace the jre6 inside the code with jre7 should work
